Achievements

Co-curricular Activity

Public Speaking

Champion at “National Energy Day-Speech Competition”, awarded by the honorable president of Bangladesh (2015).

Debating

Finalist: CSDS Fundraiser 2020 Format: British Parliamentary, Category: Open
